title: Sri Jayananda Prabhu Goes Back to Godhead | HH Stoka Krishna Swami
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.text: Jayananda Prabhu was always engaged after coming in touch with Prabhupada in devotional service
as Prabhupada instructed him towards the end of his life when he realized he has got
cancer. He knew that very soon he is going to die, quit his body. He did not want to take
treatment in the hospital but he came back to the temple and he requested devotees to
help him to always remember Krishna. he diverted his mind away from the
pain and the complications of the disease towards hearingus chanting about Krishna,
about the holy name of Krishna, all of the past tense of Krishna and engaging with devotees
in the temple in this way he was preparing to quit the body.
actually came, he was completely absorbed in Krishna Consciousness.
Prabhupada confirmed because he was engaged always in Krishna Consciousness, so he went
